NotificationVault My Notification Listener Settings Notification Access Required This app needs access to your notifications to store and display them. Please grant access in settings.
Open Settings All Apps Filter by app Notifications No notifications recorded in the last 7 days, or none matching the current filter.
All // For app bar Open Search Close Search Clear Search No notifications match your filters.
More options Delete all notifications Confirm Delete All Are you sure you want to delete all captured notifications? This action cannot be undone. Delete All Cancel
%d selected Close selection mode Delete selected Select all Confirm Delete Are you sure you want to delete %d notification(s)? Delete
More actions Ignore all from %s Create rule to ignore similar... Manage Ignore Rules
Create Ignore Rule Edit Ignore Rule Rule based on a notification from \n%s Title contains Content contains Save Rule Any App App
Manage Ignore Rules Ignored Apps Custom Rules You haven\'t ignored any apps. Use the menu on a notification to ignore an app. You haven\'t created any custom rules. Use the menu on a notification to create a rule. Stop ignoring this app Delete this rule Edit this rule For Any App For %s where title contains \"%s\" where content contains \"%s\" and Close
